name: Mentorship-Program
desc: A full-stack web application designed to connect mentors and mentees efficiently. Built using Next.js 15, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS, the platform features core functionalities like user authentication (signup, login, logout), profile management, and mentorship request handling (send, accept, and decline requests).

name: Trailer-Verse
desc: Designed and developed TrailerVerse, an innovative platform for browsing and discovering movie trailers. Integrated third-party APIs (e.g., TMDB or YouTube API) to fetch and display dynamic trailer content with seamless user experience by using React.

name: Stri-Sakhi
desc: Developed Stri-Sakhi, a platform dedicated to providing resources, community support, and empowerment tools for women, leveraging Next.js for scalability and performance
